website_summaries.verdict: This low cost bottle jack is a compact way to keep an emergency jack on-hand in your car.
pros: Holds its position after you set it
Rated to hold up to 30 tons
cons: Like other bottle jacks, this model does not lift very far

customer_reviews.title: Excellent little jack
customer_reviews.text: I've used it multiple times and it works great. I like this size because I use it for my riding mower and it is small enough to get under the frame, but strong enough to lift it up and hold it steady with no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Peterson

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy for a truck... I sent mine back
customer_reviews.text: Junk... sent it back as soon as it arrived. Was listed as 2 ton but could not lift the front wheel off the ground for my 2001 Toyota Tundra. That’s when I saw the picture on the box of only use for cars.
customer_reviews.author: Honest Ed

customer_reviews.title: Great for removing springs from rear axle.
customer_reviews.text: Great little bottle jack for the right job. ...This isn't a replacement for a regular floor jack or even a spare tire jack, unless you have a small car. I used this to wedge into my suspension (2001 Mustang) and bring my rear axle down on one side after removing the shock. Helped me remove my coil springs with ease and saved the hassle of trying to use a spring compressor. I was also able to remove my stock exhaust piping without needing to cut it out of the car.
customer_reviews.author: clashcityrockr7

customer_reviews.title: So much better than a regular jack
customer_reviews.text: This little guy save me a lot of grief. And fact I went and bought one for each one of our cars and it works just great. No need to carry a humongous Jack around it does the job was there any trouble. It doesn’t take up much space it’s easy to work with and the set up is even easier.
customer_reviews.author: RedStorm2214

customer_reviews.title: Nice and compact
customer_reviews.text: My 4 star review I guess isn’t so much the jack’s fault. I have a truck and this barely gets it off the ground to put a spare on. Great deal and perfect for most applications.
customer_reviews.author: Luke Tanner

customer_reviews.title: Slowly....
customer_reviews.text: It's the right size for small cars and projects around the yard but unfortunately this item doesn't hold position like there is a very slow leak somewhere.
customer_reviews.author: tj

customer_reviews.title: Worked great
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a juice presser but got issues with its hydraulic jack that came with it so I purchased this separately. This one is much better than the one I got. It has perfect height and very easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Heo Moi

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Use this for a clamping mold. Lots of clamping pressure.
customer_reviews.author: Cole B.

customer_reviews.title: Works.
customer_reviews.text: Jack works just fine but its still very tall. Its can't fit on Lincoln MKZ 12, so before ordering check if can fit on your car.
customer_reviews.author: VladaZ

customer_reviews.title: Good for home projects
customer_reviews.text: Good for home projects, cheap and disposable. I used it to lift a concrete slab back in place, worked fine.
customer_reviews.author: nicholas

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Strong little jack. Be sure to wash your hands after use. Lead paint warning
customer_reviews.author: D Mills

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: I used 6 of these for lifting my house to put blocks under my beams. Great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: maddogwinters

customer_reviews.title: Great Jack at a Low Price!
customer_reviews.text: Great Product at an Outstanding price its a must have for any Truck or SUV
customer_reviews.author: Omar G.

customer_reviews.title: Small jack that lifts. I have a small car ...
customer_reviews.text: Small jack that lifts. I have a small car without a spare or jack. This unit gets it in the air.
customer_reviews.author: M. Dill

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: Does exactly what it is supposed to do. Perfect to keep in my toolbox.
customer_reviews.author: JENNIFER HANNICKEL

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Compact size which is what I wanted to carry in my pickup for emergency use.
customer_reviews.author: Noel A Guthmiller

customer_reviews.title: disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Didn't work at all. I followed instructions but it didn't hold. Yes valve is shut tight.
customer_reviews.author: M D

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Would trust this jack for anything. Will not hold up anything. Broke on first use. Lucky I'm not dead!
customer_reviews.author: JunieA

customer_reviews.title: Great Jack
customer_reviews.text: I used it to support the RV steps. It worked great on various slope grounds.
customer_reviews.author: JSS Studios

customer_reviews.title: Good to have in the trunk
customer_reviews.text: Cant beat the price. Good to have in the trunk.
customer_reviews.author: Bob G

customer_reviews.title: dissapoinment
customer_reviews.text: its always going down just few hour and its going down again and its frostrating if i can return i will or change to diffrent brand i just dont have the box anymore
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Jack seems to be well built, but it stopped ...
customer_reviews.text: Jack seems to be well built, but it stopped holding the load during the very first lift of one corner of a 3500lb car. Had to pick one up locally just to change my tire. Will be returning.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I don't know if it is the product or my ...
customer_reviews.text: I don't know if it is the product or my my car but it doesn't lift my car high enough to change any tire on my car. I need to return it now  ̄\_(ツ)_/ ̄
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a means to jack up my boat trailer in case of a flat tire
customer_reviews.author: jclon123

customer_reviews.title: Can't be used on its side
customer_reviews.text: It won't operate when it is on its side. Very lightweight.
customer_reviews.author: CTO

product_meta.title: Pro-Lift B-002D Grey Hydraulic Bottle Jack - 2 Ton Capacity
product_meta.description:
Pro-Lift B-002D Grey Hydraulic Bottle Jack is a 2-ton bottle jack that is ideal for auto, truck service, farm and shop use. With the heat treated critical stress areas, it ensures long life performance. In addition, the carrying handle makes it so easy to carry around wherever need it.

It features the steel lifting saddle that is engineered to hold load securely.

With the extension screw, it allows Pro Lift B-002D Bottle Jack to be adjusted to accommodate desired work height.

Pro Lift B-002D Bottle Jack also features Built-In bypass system to protect against ram over-travel.

- Steel Lifting Saddle Engineered to Hold Load Securely
- Extension Screw Adjusts to Accommodate Desired Work Height
- Built-In Bypass System to Protect against Ram Over-Travel
- Heat Treated Critical Stress Areas
- Designed to Meet the Latest ANSI/PALD Standards

Specifications

- Capacity: 2 Ton
- Lifting Range: 7-1/8 x 13-5/8 inch
- Carrying Handle: No
- Item Weight: 7 Lbs

Pro Lift B-002D Bottle Jack is backed with SFA 90 Days Warranty from the Date of Purchase.

Grab one now to add to your home tool set
feature_bullets: The product is manufactured in china
Steel lifting saddle engineered to hold load securely
Extension screw adjusts to accommodate desired work height
Built-in bypass system protects against ram over travel
Heat treated critical stress areas ensure long life performance

Extension screw adjusts to accommodate desired work height
